having been buried <S%G4916>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G908>baptism<s%>, wherein3739, 1722 ye were <S%G2532>also<s%> raised <S%G4891>with<s%> him <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in the <S%G1753>working<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

having <S%G554>despoiled<s%> the <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1849>powers<s%>, he made a <S%G1165>show<s%> of them <S%G3954>openly<s%>, triumphing <S%G2358>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.
